abstract: Former Comverse Technology chief executive Jacob Alexander pleads guilty to securities fraud charges; had vanished in 2006 while being investigated for backdating stock options.

headline.main: Fugitive Chief Executive Pleads Guilty to Securities Fraud Charges

snippet: Jacob Alexander, former chief executive of Comverse Technology, vanished in 2006 while being investigated for backdating stock options....
lead_paragraph: Jacob Alexander, former chief executive of Comverse Technology, vanished in 2006 while being investigated for backdating stock options.
